title: Pectin Methylesterification Impacts the Relationship between Photosynthesis and Plant Growth1[OPEN]
authors: Sarathi M. Weraduwage, Sang-Jin Kim, Luciana Renna, Fransisca C. Anozie, Thomas D. Sharkey, Federica Brandizzi
abstract: High levels of methylesterification of pectin allow for enhanced cell expansion, partitioning of resources to leaf growth, and increased leaf area for photosynthesis, which in turn enhance plant growth.
